price: Kuma ka ambaci Ismã'ila a cikin Littãfi. Lalle shi, yã kasance mai gaskiyar alkawari, kuma yã kasance Manzo, Annabi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلۡوَعۡدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi is'māʿīla innahu kāna ṣādiqa al-waʿdi wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
